workflows.title: Single Image Generation
workflows.description: Generate an AI image from a source image (img2img) with enhanced styling and effects

workflows.title: Single Video Generation
workflows.description: Generate an AI video from a source image (img2video) with motion effects

workflows.title: Image Series Generation
workflows.description: Generate a series of related images from a concept using LLM-powered prompt expansion

workflows.title: Image to Video Transition
workflows.description: Create smooth interpolated video transitions between two images with easing effects

workflows.title: Full Content Pipeline
workflows.description: Complete end-to-end workflow: concept development to final video production

workflows.title: UGC Content Factory
workflows.description: Automated user-generated content creation for social media and marketing campaigns

workflows.title: LoRA Dataset Generator
workflows.description: Generate 20 varied training images from 3 reference identity photos across frontal, three-quarter, side profile, and variety shots
